description: This file provides validation helpers for Note entities, including functions to check if a note is empty and to sanitize note data.

classes.name: NoteValidation
classes.description: A utility class offering static methods to validate and sanitize Note objects.

methods.name: isEmpty
methods.description: Checks if a Note object has both an empty title and content.

methods.name: sanitize
methods.description: Creates a sanitized copy of a Note with trimmed title and content.
